pysar.signal.medfilt2d¶

pysar.signal.medfilt2d(data, window, null=None, numthrd=8)[source]¶

2d median filter

Parameters:

data : 2d array

array to be filtered

window : int or 2-element array-like (x,y)

window size for filter. If int, window is square.

null : float

null value to exclude from filter [None]

numthrd : int

number of pthreads [8]
